overview:
As COO of BoardProspects, Bobby is responsible for day-to-day management of the company, managing business relationships with strategic partners, and ensuring that the BoardProspects website provides users with a seamless experience. He ensures that all team members understand the plan and exactly how their role will impact the success of the company. Bobby is expected to drive accountability and excellence; develop team members; and bring the BoardProspects strategic vision to life at all levels of the company.

Before co-founding BoardProspects, Bobby practiced law in Boston, MA. He earned his undergraduate and masterâ€™s degrees from Connecticut College, where he is a member of the athletic hall of fame, and his law degree from Northeastern University School of Law. Prior to law school, Bobby held positions as Assistant Director of Information Technology at Roxbury Latin School and Director of Information Technology and Computer Science Teacher at the Winchendon School. He currently serves on the Advisory Boards of IvyShip Ventures, Inc. and clikMedia, Inc.
